_sText:
ba_jail_metalworld   By $p€€D}X

My first jail map ever and my 5th map ever, my skills imrpooved during this map edit, so my nextmap will probably be twice as good as this one...

The map *

Contains: Weponary CT spawn with glass cabine for wepons, A bank with money and a ventilasjon exit where u can get out from, The hall wich contains the cells, big cage a ISOLAT, SAUNA, MEDIC and ``The box`` pool wich have a secret teleportway under the diving board and have awasome design. The showers wich it is a secret smoke granade in, football pitch wich have good design (Ball must maybe improov) Kitchen with a cooler self with water bootles and fruit in it and secret wepon and stuff, the shot 4 shot field wich is good for !lr. credits room, mount ghost wicvh is a climbing map inside the jail, (a small one of course). and the last room: What box am i in? room.

PS: the map is full of secrets...

NB! new notic of bugs: theres a T spawnpoint in a corridor that should have been deleted!!!
